com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl
Class RemoveLinkMutateOperator

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xevolution.evolution.impl.AbstractEvolutionObject
      com.xtructure.xevolution.operator.impl.AbstractOperator<D>
          com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl.AbstractNEATOperator<GeneMap>
              com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl.RemoveLinkMutateOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObject, MutateOperator<GeneMap>, Operator<GeneMap>
public class RemoveLinkMutateOperator
extends AbstractNEATOperator<GeneMap>
implements MutateOperator<GeneMap>

RemoveLinkMutateOperator is a MutateOperator that removes a single link from a Genome's GeneMap. If any hidden nodes are left disconnect in the GeneMap as a result of the removal, they are removed as well.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Method Detail

mutate

public NEATGenome<GeneMap> mutate(int idNumber,
                                  Genome<GeneMap> genome)
                           throws Operator.OperationFailedException
Creates a child NEATGenome by removing a link from the given Genome's GeneMap. The link to remove is chosen at random. If removing the link causes any hidden nodes to be disconnected, those nodes are removed as well.

Specified by:
mutate in interface MutateOperator<GeneMap>
Parameters:
idNumber - the instance number for the id of the child Genome
genome - the parent Genome
Returns:
the child Genome
Throws:
OperationFailedException - If there are no links in the given Genome's GeneMap
Operator.OperationFailedException
See Also:
MutateOperator.mutate(int, com.xtructure.xevolution.genetics.Genome)
